channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Secure Copy Content Protection and Content Locking
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Secure Copy Content Protection and Content Locking

item.title: CVE-2024-6888|2024-09-04T06:00:03.859Z -- unknown -- secure%20copy%20content%20protection%20and%20content%20locking
item.description: The Secure Copy Content Protection and Content Locking WordPress plugin before 4.1.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-6889|2024-09-04T06:00:04.054Z -- unknown -- secure%20copy%20content%20protection%20and%20content%20locking
